quotes.sanskrit: एकस्मिन् समये एकः विषयः अतीव उत्तमः नियमः अस्ति।
quotes.english: One thing at a time is a very good rule.

quotes.sanskrit: क्रियायाः फलं निश्चितं नास्ति, परं कर्तव्यं निश्चितम्।
quotes.english: The result of action is uncertain, but duty is certain.
You have the right to work only, but never to its fruits.
